description:
Extend their surf season in a shorty spring-suit. 2mm neoprene is a welcome layer when it’s nice enough to swim but too cold for just a swimsuit. Flatlock seams eliminate chafing and won’t impede their strokes when they’re out catching waves.

  • 2mm neoprene provides warmth on days when a swimsuit won't cut it
  • Xcel neoprene uses earth-mined limestone in place of petrochemicals, reducing carbon footprint by 200g of CO emissions per wetsuit
  • Back zipper for easy on and off
  • Flatlock seams lie flat on skin for a comfortable fit
  • Xcel recommends this suit for water temperatures between 18 and 21°C
name: Xcel Axis 2mm Short Sleeve Springsuit - Youths
